nodes.text: A Dug debris loader was a Dug vehicle that served in Malastare's armed forces during the Clone Wars.
The Dug debris loader had a large crane that could pick up debris and ammunition. An enclosed cockpit was located at the front of the vehicle for the driver/crane operator.

They were used at the Battle of Malastare, where the debris loaders supplied the Dug rail guns with ammunition. When the Zillo Beast climbed out of the sinkhole created by the electro-proton bomb, it destroyed several of these units.
